ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Main function "decode" is used to decode coded key values to plain text. Function "code" can be used to code plain text to code if there is a 1:1 relation between the two. The concept relies on 'keyvalue' objects used for translation. There are several 'keyvalue' objects included in the areas of geographical regional codes, administrative health care unit codes, diagnosis codes and more. It is also easy to extend the use by arbitrary  code sets.

Main function "decode" is used to decode coded key values to plain text. Function "code" can be used to code plain text to code if there is a 1:1 relation between the two. The concept relies on 'keyvalue' objects used for translation. There are several 'keyvalue' objects included in the areas of geographical regional codes, administrative health care unit codes, diagnosis codes and more. It is also easy to extend the use by arbitrary  code sets.

name: r-decoder
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.2.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-decoder
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/decoder_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/decoder/decoder_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 28cc0b77e739a31b32539345920f3d4478f97a833b7223a86ad40cbbc468afcb

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 5
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-backports
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-backports

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('decoder')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('decoder')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://www.bitbucket.com/cancercentrum/decoder
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Main function "decode" is used to decode coded key values to plain text. Function "code" can be used to code plain text to code if there is a 1:1 relation
    between the two. The concept relies on 'keyvalue' objects used for translation. There are several 'keyvalue' objects included in the areas of geographical regional
    codes, administrative health care unit codes, diagnosis codes and more. It is also easy to extend the use by arbitrary  code sets.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
